content.rendered:
Directed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali.

Written by Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Mallika Dutt. Prakash Kapadia.

Cast Ranveer Singh(Peshwa Bajirao Ballal). Deepika Padukone(Mastani). Priyanka Chopra Jonas(Kashibai (as Priyanka Chopra)). Tanvi Azmi(Radha Maa). Mahesh Manjrekar(Chattrapati Shahu Maharaj). Raza Murad(Nizam of Deccan). Aditya Pancholi(Panth Pratinidhi). Milind Soman(Ambaji Panth). Vaibhav Tatwawadi(Chimaji). Yatin Karyekar(Krishnaji Bhatt). Benjamin Gilani(Raja Chhatrasaal). Zila Khan(Ruhani Begum). Ganesh Yadav(Malhar Rao). Sukhada Khandkekar(Anutai (as Sukhda Abhijeet Khandkekar)). Anuja Sathe(Bhiutai (as Anuja Anil Sathe)). Swarali Marathe(Jhumri (as Swarangi Mukund Marathe)). Snehalata Vasaikar(Bhanumati). Amol Bawdekar(Shiva Bhatt). Ayush Tandon(Nana Saheb). Sachin Rawal(Tukoji). Shabbir Ali(Bangash (as Shabir Ali)). Karrtik Ahuja(Nasir Jung). Tejashree Manohar Dharne(Shalu Bai). Mrunmayi Arun Supal(Gopika Bai). Vivek Ghamande(Veer Singh). Rudra Soni(Young Nana Saheb). Jason D’Souza(Shamsher Bahadur). Naeem Khan(Gundoji). Rajeev Mishra(Ghorpade). Vijay Andalkar(Ranoji). Yashwant Wasnik(Navik (as Yashwant Wasnaik)). Altamash(Messenger). Tanvir(Mughal Soldier). Musheer Khan(Bundelkhandi Soldier 1). Saba Shaikh(Lady 1). Ranjeet Kaur Saini(Lady 2). Preeti Shaikh(Lady 3). Shifa(Baby Raghunath). Munna(Shaniwaar Vada Guard). Varad(Raghunath). Anil Karndikar(Vaidya). Vikramjeet S. Sandhu(Qasid 1 (as Vikramjeet Sandhu – Gulu)). Arvinder Gill(Qasid 2) . Harsh Shashwat(Press promoter). Irrfan Khan(Narrator (voice) (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Siddharth Chheda. Chetan Deolekar. Arvinder Gill. Kishore Lulla. Pratik Rawal. Shobha Sant. Ashish Tandel.

Production Bhansali Productions. Eros Worldwide.
